dcterms:creator: E. Grefenstette
M. Sadrzadeh
dcterms:description: The verb disambiguation task involves distinguishing between senses of an ambiguous verb, given subject and object nouns as context. The dataset consists of 200 sentence pairs, where the two sentences in each pair have the same subject and object but differ in the verb, ranked by human evaluators on a 1-7 similarity scale.
dcterms:title: GS11 (Verb Disambiguation Task)

dcterms:creator: D. Kartsaklis
M. Sadrzadeh
dcterms:description: The transitive sentence similarity dataset consists of 72 subject-verb-object sentences arranged into 108 sentence pairs. Each pair has a gold standard semantic similarity score on a 1-7 scale, with no lexical overlap between the sentences in each pair.
dcterms:title: KS14 (Transitive Sentence Similarity Dataset)
